mapper.sql: tmtd.jdorderno jdOrderNo, tmtd.receivingdate orderDtime, tmtd.receivingdate orderPayTime, ttb.t_title goodsName, ttb.imgurl goodsImgUrl, CONCAT(ttb.spec1, ' ', ttb.spec2) goodsSpecDesc, ttb.t_price goodsPrice, 1 goodsNum, ttb.t_price orderTotalMoney, tmtd.commision orderCouponMoney, tmtd.pays orderPayMoney, tmtd.taskstate buyerTaskStatus, '' buyerMsg, tmt.id buyerTaskId, tmt.mytaskNo buyerTaskNo, tmtd.id buyerTaskDetailId, ttb.id shopTaskId, ttb.taskno shopTaskNo
mapper.select:
select count(*) from ( SELECT tmtd.jdorderno FROM t_my_task tmt INNER JOIN t_my_task_detail tmtd ON tmtd.mytaskid = tmt.id AND tmtd.taskstate = 4 INNER JOIN t_buyer_info tbi ON tbi.userid = tmtd.buyerid INNER JOIN t_task_base ttb ON ttb.id = tmtd.taskid INNER JOIN t_shop_info shoptb ON shoptb.userid = ttb.shopId
GROUP BY tmtd.jdorderno ) tb

select tb.* from ( SELECT tmtd.jdorderno jdOrderNo, tmtd.receivingdate orderDtime, tmtd.receivingdate orderPayTime, tmtd.buyerno buyerLoginNo, tmtd.buyerid buyerId, tmtd.buyerjdnick, tmtd.taskstate, ttb.shopId, shoptb.shopName, shoptb.userid shopUserId FROM t_my_task tmt INNER JOIN t_my_task_detail tmtd ON tmtd.mytaskid = tmt.id AND tmtd.taskstate = 4 INNER JOIN t_buyer_info tbi ON tbi.userid = tmtd.buyerid INNER JOIN t_task_base ttb ON ttb.id = tmtd.taskid INNER JOIN t_shop_info shoptb ON shoptb.userid = ttb.shopId
GROUP BY tmtd.jdorderno ) tb ORDER BY tb.orderDtime desc limit ${map.start},${map.pageSize}

SELECT
FROM t_my_task tmt INNER JOIN t_my_task_detail tmtd ON tmtd.mytaskid = tmt.id AND tmtd.taskstate = 4 INNER JOIN t_buyer_info tbi ON tbi.userid = tmtd.buyerid INNER JOIN t_task_base ttb ON ttb.id = tmtd.taskid INNER JOIN t_shop_info shoptb ON shoptb.userid = ttb.shopId where tmtd.jdorderno in (${map.jdOrderNo}) ORDER BY tmtd.receivingdate desc
